articles.title: The Last of Us: TV series of hit game praised by critics - BBC
articles.description: It has been described as "comfortably the best adaptation of a video game ever made" that has been able to "break the curse" on gaming-TV crossovers.
articles.content:
Critics have universally praised the TV adaptation of hit video game The Last of Us as it's made available in the UK.
